name: Tails' Adventures 2
description:
A 2D Sonic Fangame Developed As A Sequel To The Relatively Unknown Game Gear Title "Tails' Adventures"

Play as Tails and explore a vast open area with a bunch of Collectables and Upgrades lying around.
Unlike the original game you don't have the ability to throw bombs or fly immediately so you have to unlock both of them.
The demo contains a single level called "Pollo Pier"

Controls

WASD - Move
Space - Jump/ Fly/ Stop Flying
Shift - Throw Bombs
Down + Shift - Throw Bomb Down
Control - Deploys Remote Robot/ Detonates Robot

Credits
